description.narrative: This activity (CHASE Humanitarian Emergency Relief) is a component of Humanitarian Emergency Response Operations and Stabilisation Programme (HEROS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £6,224,356. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Estonian Rescue Board, Palladium International Ltd (UK), UK - Ministry of Defence, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP). The start date is 01-11-2017 and the end date is 28-10-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
